task_background: Reset the game night lounge after a lively gathering, ensuring all devices are turned off, items are stored properly, and the space is tidy.

tasks.task_description: Place the gaming magazine on the coffee table.
Find the black wireless controller with a sticky A-button and place it in the tech storage corner.
Use the toolkit to seal the overfilled cable box.
Find the DDR dance mat that is torn at the corner, use the toolkit to seal it, and place it in the tech storage corner.
